title: Handling a Hybrid War in Ukraine
sub_head: Defense isn’t enough against Russian attacks short of an invasion.
body:
By now Vladimir Putin must understand that an outright invasion of Ukraine would cause Russia economic pain, but the strongman may believe hybrid attacks could help him achieve his goals at a lower cost. The West can do more to disabuse him of the notion.
Hybrid attacks have already begun in Ukraine. Ukrainian security services have reported hundreds of fake bombing threats this year, prompting some schools to close. A cyber attack brought down several Ukrainian government websites this month, with a message on one hacked site warning “be afraid and expect worse.” Kyiv believes the attack was carried out by Russian ally Belarus, which complicates calculations about how to retaliate.
